ygData.subject: RE: Time for another Sylly Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: As we all know, the right atmosphere is required for total immersion into character so... When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite: Day of the
ygData.messageBody:
As we all know, the right atmosphere is required for total immersion into
character so...

When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite:

Day of the week to play:
Saturday = Bazaar Day!

Time of day:
Afternoon

Longest stretch of continuous play:
16 hours (gained a whole bubble, yay)

Way to have game sounds:
On

Distance to sit from display:
3-4 feet (also have 21" display at 1280x1024)

TV show to have on:
Monday Night Football in the adjoining room

Music to listen to:
The spooky theme by the secret entrance to the rogues guild in E Freeport

Beverage (non-alcoholic):
Heh, heh Pepsi w/ nothin' (Caffeine Free, Diet)

Beverage (alcoholic):
Gypsy Wine (Port)

Health Food:
Celery

Junk Food:
Little Debbie's Swiss Cake Rolls (that Debbie is some baker)

Clothes to wear:
Whatever, usually shorts and hawai... Hey! On Monday's Miami Dolphins' hat


Kitasi
